definition: my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)

to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview

sentences.english: This article tries to give a brief discussion on Chen's achievements and mistakes.
sentences.chinese: 本文试对陈独秀的功过是非略陈管见。

sentences.english: The above is what I found from my work. Personal and limited opinions only.
sentences.chinese: 上述是个人在工作过程中的一些看法，个人管见而已。

definition: to venture to/to presume to/to take the liberty of
to just talk for the sake of talking
lit. a brick thrown to prompt others to produce a jade (idiom)/fig. a modest suggestion intended to prompt others to come forward with better ideas
in order to minimally fulfill one's responsibilities/in order to get off the hook
my unworthy manuscript (humble expr.)/my humble writing
my unworthy manuscript (humble expr.)/my humble writing
